com.riskgame.service

Interface PlayerHandlerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerHandlerImpl

    public interface PlayerHandlerInterface
    This a interface where Playerhandler business logic implemented. This interface has methods which can do add player, populatecountries and place army etc. things.
    Author:
    Raj Mistry
    See Also:
    GamePlayPhase
